statements: SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_type, location, contact_number FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT provider_type FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_type ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Hospital';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, contact_number FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Clinic' AND location = 'California';
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Pharmacy' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, provider_type, location, contact_number FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_type <> 'Pharmacy' ORDER BY location, provider_name;
SELECT * FROM provider_information;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM provider_information WHERE provider_specialty = 'Pediatrics';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM provider_information ORDER BY provider_location;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM provider_information WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology' OR provider_specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS num_of_providers FROM provider_information GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM provider_information WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM provider_information WHERE provider_location = 'New York';
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty, provider_contact FROM provider_information ORDER BY provider_specialty ASC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) FROM provider_information GROUP BY provider_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT p.provider_name, b.amount FROM provider_information p JOIN billing_details b ON p.provider_id = b.provider_id WHERE b.amount > 1000 ORDER BY b.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC, provider_name ASC, provider_specialty
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_dob FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_dob ASC

SELECT c.claim_id, p.patient_name, pr.provider_name, c.claim_amount FROM Claims c JOIN Patients p ON c.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN Providers pr ON c.provider_id = pr.provider_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY c.claim_amount DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_claims, SUM(claim_amount) as total_claim_amount, AVG(claim_amount) as avg_claim_amount FROM Claims
SELECT * FROM healthcare_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;

SELECT medical_records.record_id, medical_records.diagnosis, billing_details.provider_charge, billing_details.insurance_payment FROM medical_records JOIN billing_details ON medical_records.record_id = billing_details.record_id;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM healthcare_providers WHERE provider_specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Female' AND patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM healthcare_providers JOIN medical_records ON healthcare_providers.provider_id = medical_records.provider_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis='Hypertension';
SELECT * FROM HealthcareProviders;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT provider_name, address, phone_number FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM HealthcareProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, address FROM HealthcareProviders WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';

SELECT p.patient_name, a.appointment_date, a.appointment_time, pr.provider_name FROM Patients p JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN HealthcareProviders pr ON a.provider_id = pr.provider_id WHERE a.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC;
